content.raw: I agree with the ideal case scenario but I don't think it will work right now, as we would have to simulate fluids and I don't think Gazebo is good at that. We could use the `liftdragplugin` in Gazebo but it would require extra work beyond the scope of this pull request. I don't know for sure whether moving the propeller has an impact on the dynamics but I'm assuming its impact is low as teleoperating the vehicle looks reasonable.
content.html: I agree with the ideal case scenario but I don't think it will work right now, as we would have to simulate fluids and I don't think Gazebo is good at that. We could use the liftdragplugin in Gazebo but it would require extra work beyond the scope of this pull request. I don't know for sure whether moving the propeller has an impact on the dynamics but I'm assuming its impact is low as teleoperating the vehicle looks reasonable.
